newsitem.title: USA: Chemed Corp Q1 shr $0.85 vs $1.24.
newsitem.headline: Chemed Corp Q1 shr $0.85 vs $1.24.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
Note: The company said 1997 net income and net earnings per share numbers include pretax gains aggregating $9.079 million ($5.626 million aftertax or $0,56 per share) from the sale of investments.
The company said the 1996 net income and net earnings per share numbers include pretax gains aggregating $14.208 million ($8.924 million aftertax or $0.91 per share) from sales of investments.
